text: Hello there! How are you today?
I am fantastic, thank you for asking, how about yourself?
I am doing wonderful though it is hot up here in ohio today!
I prefer warmer temperatures, I absolutely despise the cold haha.
Yes  me too! How do you feel about children who are suffering and need help

That's a loaded question if I've ever heard one... I thought this was going to be some active participant study on interaction between conflicting personalities or something like that. I'll play along though. I feel sad, helpless and a bit perturbed if I'm honest.
Well Im sorry you feel that way. I just wanted to know if you have ever donated or helped kids in need?
Yes I have, though I'm wary of doing so currently, too many organizations abuse that funding.
I hear you! I donated per month to compassion international for years and years! I supported a young girl who is grown now.

I currently work with some people who travel the Southwestern US and set up CSA farms and connect them via outreach centers to people who need food or labor. I find action helps more than money, sends a deeper message and imparts a strong work ethic to those you help.
I do agree with that to a point. Action does help but these companies do need monetary support as well or they cannot trhrive.
Couldn't agree more.
That's wonderful! Have you head of the organization Save the Children?
Yes I have.
They are needing a lot of help currently, there are more and more kids needing help.

Like I said, I'm more of the opinion action is the better choice. I always ask myself, why are these kids starving? Why are those directly responsible for the children unable to care for them? To me it comes down to failure as a species. We allow this travesty to continue and think throwing money at it will help. It wont.

That makes sense to a point. Without funding the companies cannot help. Anyway heres my question How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).?
I don't believe I will donate anything. $0.
I really wish you would donate something any amount helps.
I wish you would come along with us next weekend to Oklahoma and help build the Community Center we are working on, any amount helps.
